settings.question: What is weathering steel?
settings.answer: Weathering steel forms a protective layer that naturally oxidises when exposed to the elements. This creates a warm, rust-like finish that seals itself over time, providing strength and corrosion resistance. It develops a natural, earthy patina that suits any garden or outdoor space.

settings.question: Will my product arrive pre-rusted?
settings.answer: We go to great effort to pre-weather our stock items, but occasionally, due to availability, some products may be sent in raw steel (grey in colour). Don’t worry — the steel will begin to rust once it’s exposed to moisture, which is exactly what it’s designed to do.

settings.question: Why do colour variations occur?
settings.answer: Each piece is unique. Variations in tone and texture are part of the natural rusting process and depend on the steel’s source, age, and weather conditions during pre-weathering.

settings.question: How long does it take to rust?
settings.answer: Rusting begins quite quickly once exposed to moisture, but it can take up to 18 months for the surface to fully self-seal. Climate and exposure to rain or humidity will affect how fast the patina develops.

settings.question: How can I speed up the rusting process?
settings.answer: Lightly mist the surface with water each day to encourage an even rusting effect. Rust forms more quickly when the piece is lying flat or exposed to consistent moisture.

settings.question: Will rust stain surrounding surfaces?
settings.answer: In the early stages of weathering, rust residue may stain walls, tiles, or concrete. We recommend using standoffs for wall-mounted pieces and placing garden items on tiles or pavers to prevent staining.

settings.question: Can I stop my piece from rusting?
settings.answer: If you prefer a raw steel look, you can slow the rusting process by applying a product such as Penetrol (available from hardware or paint stores) every six months. It penetrates the steel to help prevent moisture and oxygen from causing rust.

settings.question: Do you offer custom designs?
settings.answer: Yes, we can tailor pieces to your size, shape, or design preferences. Get in touch to discuss your ideas and we’ll bring them to life.

settings.question: Can your pieces be displayed outdoors?
settings.answer: Absolutely. Our products are designed for outdoor conditions. Once the steel has sealed, it forms a protective layer that’s ideal for gardens, courtyards, and exterior walls.
